SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.usermanagement

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.usermanagement.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
The lobby contains up to four users. It has a manager (an user) and an unique id (incremental from 1). The class is synchronized.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(User creator)
      Constructs a Lobby with an unique id (incremental from 0). The creator must be not null.
      Parameters:
      creator - The user who creates the lobby.

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if the lobby is full.
      Returns:
      true if full, false otherwise

      Returns:

      Checks if the given user (as User) is in the lobby.

    • gameStarted

      public boolean gameStarted()
      Checks if the lobby is in game.
      Returns:
      true if full, false otherwise

    • getUsers

      public List<User> getUsers()
      Returns:
      A copy of the list of users connected to the lobby

    • getManager

      public UserInfo getManager()
      Returns:
      The manager of the lobby

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(User user)
      Tries to insert an user to the lobby. This method fails if the lobby is full or if the user is already in a lobby.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to insert to the lobby
      Returns:
      true if successfull, false otherwise

    • removeUser

      public boolean removeUser(User user)
      Removes the given user from the lobby, if he's present. If the lobby manager is removed, the next "oldest" user in the lobby takes his place. If there are no users left after removing the given one, this method deletes the lobby and returns false. The method removes the user only if the game hasn't been started.
      Parameters:
      user - user to remove from the lobby
      Returns:
      true if removed, false if the user wasn't in the lobby or the game has already been started.

    • startGame

      public boolean startGame()
      Must be called when starting a game. After this method is called, the gameStarted attribute will be equal to true.
      Returns:
      false if the game was already started or there are not enough players, true otherwise

    • getLobbies

      public static List<LobbyInfo> getLobbies()
      Returns the list of active lobbies.
      Returns:
      The list of active lobbies as LobbyInfo.
      See Also:
      • LobbyInfo

    • getLobby

      public static Lobby getLobby(int lobbyId)
      Finds the lobby with the given id.
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - the lobby id
      Returns:
      the Lobby corresponding to the given id or null if not found

    • getLobby

      public static Lobby getLobby(UserInfo userInfo)
      Finds the lobby with the given user.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the user in the lobby
      Returns:
      the Lobby corresponding to the given id

    • deleteLobby

      public static boolean deleteLobby(int lobbyId)
      Deletes a lobby. Must be called when the match ends.
      Parameters:
      lobbyId - the id of the lobby
      Returns:
      true if the lobby existed and was deleted, false if not found

    • anyLobbyContains

      Checks if the user is in one of the active lobbies.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the UserInfo of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user is in a lobby, false otherwise

    • removeUserIfGameNotStarted

      public static boolean removeUserIfGameNotStarted(UserInfo userInfo)
      Removes the user from the lobby he is in. If the game has already been started no action is done.
      Parameters:
      userInfo - the UserInfo of the player
      Returns:
      true if removed from any lobby, false otherwise

      public GameFlowManager getGameFlowManager()

      Returns:
